TopicTitle: S. So yeahave starts up and puts camera on the side of the VAB, cannot do anything.

Articles.Content: I have a save that starts up and places the camera on the side of the VAB and I cannot do anything except the Warp to Morning button. I do not think my mods are to blame because I have another save with the exact same mods that is launching fine. I really do not want to start another save beacuse the first one I started got bugged and then I started a new one and THAT got bugged and now I started ANOTHER one and THAT got bugged. So... Help? Also, I put hyperjump beacons around Laythe, the Mun, and Minmus and landed on the Mun and Minmus so I do not want to start over. Help?
We need your mod list and a screenshot would help too. Are you sure all the mods you use are up to date?
That can sometimes happen. Hit Alt-F12 to open the debug menu and click on "clear input lock stack," that always clears it up for me.
Thanks, Clear Input Lock Stack fixed it.

I have experienced this issue before.  I noticed that the game would do this every time that I tabbed out of KSP while loading a career save from the main menu.  Staying tabbed in prevented this problem for me.
